sentences.sentence: The end result was the prototype Self-Motivating Heuristically Programmed Combat Droid, or the IG-series 100 MagnaGuards.
sentences.translation: 其成果就是自激发启发式程序格斗机器人原型，即IG系列100磁卫机器人。
